named-query.name: getUserByUserId
named-query.query: Select a from TmUserInfo a where a.userId = :paramUserId and a.visible = TRUE

named-query.name: getProjectsByUser
named-query.query: Select a from TmProject a where a.projOwner = :paramUserId

named-query.name: getUserProjectByProjectId
named-query.query: Select a from TmUserProject a where a.projId = :paramProjId

named-query.name: getModulesByProjectId
named-query.query: Select a from TmModule a where a.projId = :paramProjId

named-query.name: getIssuesByModuleId
named-query.query: Select a from TmIssue a where a.modId = :paramModId

named-query.name: getIssueCommentsByIssueId
named-query.query: Select a from TmIssueComment a where a.issId = :paramIssId

named-query.name: getIssueAttachmentsByIssueId
named-query.query: Select a from TmIssueAttachment a where a.issId = :paramIssId
